reference.title: Creating a list of new terms or found terms

section.indexterm: terminology listscreating lists of new terms
terminology listscreating lists of found terms
section.p: New terms lists and found terms lists are created during analysis of a document.

ul.li: At least one document must exist.
At least one dictionary must exist.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The document in the Document List window
Analyzeâ€¦ from the File menu
Create lists in the Analyze Documents window
Create list of new terms or Create list of found terms in the List Settings window
Any dictionaries to be used
Set to return to the previous window
Analyze to begin the analysis and the creation of the selected terminology lists

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p: For a detailed description of the options see .

section.title: Results
section.p: The terminology lists are created according to your specifications.
